sect2.title: Contents of GCC
sect2.para: The GCC package contains the GNU compiler collection, including the C and C++ compilers.

sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: c++, c++filt, cc (link to gcc), cc1, cc1plus, collect2, cpp, cpp0, g++, gcc, gccbug, gcov and tradcpp0

sect3.title: Library Files
sect3.para: libgcc.a, libgcc_eh.a, libgcc_s.so, libiberty.a, libstdc++.[a,so], libsupc++.a
